original: BOSAEUS, Elis Walfrid, Civilingenjör, Djursholm, f Sthlm 31/8 76 av disp Nils B o Olga Hallen, gm Lisa Fielding. Ex tekn högsk 99. Vkst dir Lessebo AB 02—18, led av arb.råd 19, ordf o ch 23—25, v. ordf sed. 35, vkst dir i Strömsnäs br AB 26—33. Led av tulltaxekomm 06—09, sakk i soc.dep f låne-ärend 33—42, i fin.dep f tullärend 19—22, f vissa traktatärend 19, f papp.pr 20, kursled v HHS 21—24, Sv omb v intern arb.konf i Geneve 25, led av arb.lösh.utredn 27—32, styr.-led i Jordbr.bkn sed. 34, ordf i halmind.ut-redn 37—38, i exp.huskomm 37—39, led av småind.utredn 40—41. Resor på off uppdr t Finl 22, Tjeckoslov 24. Av trycket: Produktionsförhåll i papp.ind, 22, Molae chartariae suecanae II, 23, upps i ekon o tekn ämn. KN02kl, RVO, KFinlVRO.
translated: BOSAEUS, Elis Walfrid, Civil Engineer, Djursholm, b. Sthlm 31/8 1876, son of disp. Nils B and Olga Hallen, m. Lisa Fielding. Former student at the Technical University 1899. Vice Managing Director at Lessebo AB from 1902 to 1918, member of the Labor Council from 1919, Chairman and Chief from 1923 to 1925, Deputy Chairman of the Board from 1935, Vice Managing Director at Strömsnäs br AB from 1926 to 1933. Member of the Customs Tariff Commission from 1906 to 1909, expert in the Ministry of Social Affairs for loan matters from 1933 to 1942, in the Ministry of Finance for customs matters from 1919 to 1922, for certain treaty matters in 1919, for paper prizes in 1920, course leader at HHS from 1921 to 1924, Swedish delegate to an international labor conference in Geneva in 1925, member of the Unemployment Investigation Commission from 1927 to 1932, board-member and manager of the Agricultural Bank since 1934, Chairman of the Straw Investigation Commission from 1937 to 1938, in the Export House Commission from 1937 to 1939, member of the Small Industry Investigation Commission from 1940 to 1941. Official trips to Finland in 1922, Czechoslovakia in 1924. Published: Production conditions in the paper industry, 1922, Molae chartariae suecanae II, 1923, papers on economic and technical subjects. Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star, Royal Finnish Order of the White Rose.

publications.title: Production conditions in the paper industry
